column1: "All of those feminazi bitches should learn their place in society: the kitchen!"

"What do you think tap water is, it's a gay bomb, baby. [...] You think I—I'm, like, shocked by it so I'm up here bashing it because I don't like gay people? I don't like them putting chemicals in the water that turn the friggin' frogs gay!" (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WyGq6cjcc3Q, time 0:22 to 0:43)
“Never ever threaten the United States. Or you will suffer [the] consequences[.] [T]he likes of which few throughout history have ever suffered before.”
“Everyone that’s travelling for Thanksgiving please be careful. Driving conditions will be rough with these storms! Ladies.. Let your man drive!”
